meanings.definition: The body of a coach or carriage.
meanings.sent1: The coachwork of the carriage was beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent2: The coachwork of the old coach showed intricate details.
meanings.sent3: The coachwork on the carriage looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The coachwork of the carriage was as sturdy as a fortress.
meanings.sent5: The coachwork gleamed in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: The work of constructing coach bodies.
meanings.sent1: The skilled craftsmen specialized in coachwork construction.
meanings.sent2: The coachwork required precise measurements and attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The coachwork builders joked that they were 'bodybuilders' of a different kind.
meanings.sent4: The coachwork assembly line hummed with activity, creating masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The coachwork process involved shaping metal into elegant forms.
